name: Pixel Shield
description:
Without patience, stubbornness and a special strategy you practically have no chance of surviving in the world of Pixel Shield. Complete all the j
locations with different content,weapons, enemies and bosses. You're given only one chance so if you make a mistake, you have to start over. To pass bosses and different obstacles use all kinds of tools, from cold steel to a piece of soap!
Reached the boss, try not to die and use a special attitude and weapon.

(Meant for high-qualified gamers who have high reaction and a good strategy of the game)
(The game has a genre 2D-platformer, action, shooter with a view from above.)

Peculiarities:

• Dynamic MUSIC, under which kill becomes even "feels better".

• Different types of weapons, from hand-to-hand combat to weapons of the future.

• Complete distinction of locations in STYLE and GAMEPLAY.

• HIGH levels of complexity.

• After death you start the level AGAIN, try in vain not to die.

• The game keeps a STABLE FPS on both powerful computers and on the old ones, which allows all gamers to enjoy the game.

• The game has the ability to pass STEALTH.

• DESTROY items to your advantage.

• Catch the eye at the RIGHT time to make enemies kill each other.

• Do A series of murders to get a lot of points, the number of points will show your skill at the end of the level.
